Html:
Hi,

     I am not a c++ programmer. I downloaded the OpenXMLViewer source and tried to build. Some how i managed to build Utility project successfully, but i am stuck at TransformationCore project. I am getting LNK2019 errors. Is there anything that i need to add/change in the project which is not specified in the "OpenXMLViewer_Build_Instructions_Windows.rtf" document or should i re-check the steps that i followed.

     If you couldn't help me with the information that i gave, i will give more information. Any help in this regard will be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in advance

Regards,

Sandeep
